means: （理由、论据）有说服力的，令人信服的
Compiler and Generalized Translator 编译程序与广义翻译程序

sentence.Network_en: She put forward some cogent reasons for abandoning the plan.
sentence.Network_cn: 她为放弃这个计划提出了一些具有说服力的理由。

sentence.Network_en: There were perfectly cogent reasons why Julian Cavendish should be told of the Major's impending return.
sentence.Network_cn: 要将少校即将返回的消息告知朱利安·卡文迪什是有绝对充足的理由的。
南施的演说很有说服力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... coeval ? adj. 同时代的 cogent ? adj. 使人信服的 cognizant ? adj. 认知的.
综合英语单词表(第二册下) - 豆丁网 ... cocked a. 向上翘起的 cogent a. 有说服力的 commercialize v. 商业化.
张红岩TOEFL ... coddle v. 骄养，溺爱 cogent adj. 强有力的，有说服力的 cohere vt. 附着，连贯.
SAT sentence completion flashcards | Quizlet ... impeccable 无瑕疵的 cogent 令人信服的 dupe 欺骗.

list.abs: 显而易见的发明 obvious inventioncogent provision 强行规定显着的商标 distinctive mark
one very cogent argument against direct reseeding in the spring is that land may be out of production for such a long time .一种反对春季重播的极有力的论点是春季重播时地里也许有很长一段时间不长东西。

cogent company spirit' technical high starting point , high standard of quality , delivery efficiency a high level of service' business objectives , providing our customers with quality products .康源公司本着'技术高起点、质量高标准、供货高效率、服务高水平'的企业宗旨，为广大客户提供优质产品。
She presented cogent arguments to the jury ., 她提出有力的论据向陪审团.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin cogent- 'compelling', from the verb cogere, from co- 'together' + agere 'drive'

entry.tran: 有说服力的;令人信服的
entry.def: A cogent reason, argument, or example is strong and convincing.

example.ex: There were perfectly cogent reasons why Julian Cavendish should be told of the Major's impending return.
example.tran: 要将少校即将返回的消息告知朱利安·卡文迪什是有绝对充足的理由的。

means.word_mean: 1. having the power to influence or convince;

auth_sentence.content: Does their status as victims make their opinions more cogent?
auth_sentence.res_content: Does their status as victims make their opinions more cogent?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does their status as victims make their opinions more cogent?

auth_sentence.content: I see no cogent argument from you except spiteful attacks.
auth_sentence.res_content: I see no cogent argument from you except spiteful attacks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I see no cogent argument from you except spiteful attacks.

auth_sentence.content: Is there some cogent argument buttressing your position?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is there some cogent argument buttressing your position?
